en-US.Variant: A headless context cannot be created on the Android or iOS platforms.
Buffer '{0}' is too small for the requested data.
The surface has already been prepared for export.
The specified surface does not contain a complete set of layers.
A Surface3D which is loaded from a single file must consist of square layers arranged from left to right, and the file must contain no excess space.
No graphics subsystem assembly was specified.
No audio subsystem assembly was specified.
The application's primary window has already been initialized.
The application's primary window must be initialized by the Graphics subsystem before its constructor returns.
